name: zheroen
text: I am a big fan of Kid Cusses.  I am somewhat incredulous at his omission of "applesauce", however, as Philippe has personally used that to great effect in the past.

text: I hate when things in my body "just let it all hang loose."

text: His chubby:lame ratio disagrees.

name: saint
text: Nonsense!

name: huber
text:
How good is mental image that this one creates... you kinda just know everyone was baked and drunk in front of the kid.

Applesauce should have been included - although I think my flatmate has the onions

name: whitey
text:
I think "peanutbeans" and "applesauce" are synonymous.

PS. I have the onions.

name: cracklewater
text: Holy christ the only anagram of "peanutbeans" is "bent ape anus!"

name: heccibiggs
text: Naw, "applesauce" is a substitute for "bullshit".

name: stuart
text: Applesauce is 20s slang for nonsense, guys

name: dumbeast
text: Aw, banana-oil!

name: luckyg
text: Any thoughts on what the dog barking thing is supposed to be?

name: mortshire
text: i think he's mixing his metaphors (my dogs are barking= my feet are tired) in an adorable, philippine way.

name: i_love_kate
text: Chubby for the invention of the adjective "Philippine".

name: mustconcentrate
text: Are we now calling his fans Phillippinos?

name: i_love_kate
text: That is exactly what we are doing now.

name: rowboat
text: Stop being such a tush head, Frederick.

name: i_love_kate
text:
UNCOOL, ROWBOAT.

You know I prefer "Freddie."

name: alisonface
text: I thought it might have something to do with "catcalls".  Does that make sense?

name: silver_lake
text: Dogs also bark when they're really happy or excited. That's what I think this is.

name: vincentkv
text: I think he's mixing up "She's so pretty, she'll give a dog a bone!"

name: toutsuite
text: A comment left by toutsuite was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by equinn2006, cryptfiend85, chunk, STUART)

name: dj
text: Alt text on the main page is "Not sure what the barking dog slang is a substitute for."

name: billyamericana
text: Beef gets a little crazy with the Ctrl   B when he's puzzled up purple.

name: epicurus
text: Ray's quote upon entering the house is classic. This really conveys what would basically have otherwise been one or two strips, except through the lens of Philippe, which = awesome.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by craigola, Trap, bug, godfatherofsouls)

name: zefiel
text: Anyone else wondering who L.B. is? I'm wondering if it isn't Liz, Chris wife, and suddenly I feel I've entered a sort of stalker territory :(

text: It was definitely considered

text: I LOVE Philippe's Friday Facts. Keep doing them forever.

text: Don't you hate the sort of person who poops with the door open at Thanksgiving?

text: A computer *is* a box where decisions are made

text: DiSaGrEeMeNt BoX!

text:
Look at how concerned he is about seeing a rodent!

I love Philippe forever.

name: caseyb3
text: a RODENT!

name: adonkon
text: Oh god your avatar

name: flim
text: There is ALWAYS a reason to be tired of Tom Cruise

name: tombsgrave
text: I did not know that ponies were an entirely separate type of horse.  This is news to me.

name: jocelynthepink
text: Wow, I was embarassed for Onstad at admitting that, since it samed so obvious to me. But maybe that's just because I'm female, and as such went through the stereotypical horse fixation at a young age?

name: vincentkv
text: What's a baby horse?!

name: foea
text: colt

name: blueloggy
text: and/or a foal?

name: aelindil
text:
A foal is a baby horse of either sex. A colt is a male foal. A female foal is called a filly.

The More You Know!

name: sargasm
text: This should be featured in the Smithsonian for Beef's first sentence in the bottom right corner.

name: cicadalek
text: It's the little details that get me. Ray's newest Escalade has a trash compactor. Probably because his last one is full of coffeemakers and pretzel bakers'n'shit.

name: greenideas
text: Do you suppose Clue Hat, AZ is where Clue Bucket will live with Onstad's daughter after they get married?

name: alzuna
text:
You get a chubby for linking that strip which in turn made me snortgiggle.

Also I imagine a member of the Clue family will actually establish Clue Hat. They are so backwards their last name is their first name.

name: alzuna
text: What is with that huge bottom space...I did not press enter that many times.

name: boredom_man
text: THEY'RE ALL CHING CHONG WING WONG

name: afkpuz
text:
Who is Frederick?

He tantalizes me.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Horse (duh).

name: dougthehead
text: Us Americans pose more of a threat to the general welfare of the earth every day with the massive buildup of our reckless adjectives.

name: edwell
text: "Built just like regular adjectives..."

name: lugosh
text: Just cut them up like regular adjectives?

name: anitrophaeron
text: Ray's quote reminds me very strongly of Jules complimenting Jimmy's coffee in Pulp Fiction.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Beef's little coda makes it for me. I'd like to say I'll call wine grapesauce from now on, but since I've had five beers this morning so far I'll probably forget.

name: shemmjacc
text: Friday Facts never fail.

name: oishii
text: I think L.B. hit the nail on the head that definition.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: I was hoping Kid Cusses was going to be the subject of Phillipe's first cowboy novel.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: tonight is fun and this don't matter.

name: tonyhighwind
text: If you have not had this though, you have not had friends.

name: possums
text: I think Ray and Teodor are both making fun of Medicine Hat .

name: diggidy
text: I like Medicine Hat.  There's a hotel with really big chairs.

name: diggidy
text: In Medicine Hat.

name: fosters
text: Once again Onstad has painted a picture in my mind. Unfortunately tonight that picture is Lyle dropping a deuce while the people in the next room are pretending not to notice and eating cranberry sauce.

name: tekende
text: I like how "the onions" is in italics; it gives it a whole different sound in my mind. A little deeper and drawn-out, like it would be typed in a green, dripping goopy font.

name: xiaomimi
text:

Onstad: Burgers' Jowl Bacon (bacon #2)

name: i_love_kate
text: Why, why draw that scene from Deliverance so forcefully to my mind?

text: I can only imagine Philippe's reaction when he finds out Roast Beef thinks his newspaper don't matter.

name: stubob
text: Yeah so I totally believed that ponies were just young horses so I had to look it up IMMEDIATELY after reading this. I'm dumb.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: did you see a rodent philippe was it todd

name: howl
text: squirrels aren't rodents

name: godfatherofsouls
text:
from wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.
A squirrel is any one of the many small or medium-sized rodents in the family Sciuridae.
Scientific classification
Kingdom:Animalia
Phylum: Chordata
Class: Mammalia
Order: Rodentia
Family: Sciuridae

name: howl
text: fuck

text: Wikipwnt

name: rowboat
text: I'm not specifically offended by your false statement, but it deserves at least one lame and until now it had none. Nothing personal, just a public service.

name: howl
text: I understand entirely. No hard feelings.

name: rowboat
text: I'm glad we could see eye to eye on this.

name: howl
text: I'm blind, you bastard.

name: rowboat
text:
Well, that actually explains a lot about your strange ideas regarding rodents.

You bastard.
